module.name: windirs
module.short: Get names of special directories under windows
module.descr: This unit contains only one function: . It is a simple pascal wrapper around the shfolder.dll library, and is available under Windows only.

element.short: Flag to specify if the requested folder must be created if it didn't exist yet.

element.name: GetWindowsSpecialDir
element.short: Get the location of a special directory.
element.descr: GetWindowsSpecialDir can be used to to get the path of special folders on the Windows system. The locations are identified using one of the CSIDL_* constants. If the ID of a location is or-ed with the CSIDL_FLAG_CREATE constant, then the directory will be created if it didn't exist yet (and the user has sufficient rights to do so).
element.errors: On error, an empty string is returned.

element.name: GetWindowsSpecialDir.Result
element.short: Full path of the folder identified by ID.

element.name: GetWindowsSpecialDir.ID
element.short: Identifier of the folder location to retrieve.
